trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que age como um contentor para um grupo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The MultiView control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: Neste tópico:- [introdução](#introduction) - [sintaxe declarativa](#declarative_syntax) # # controlo MultiView a introdução é um contentor para um grupo de controlos.

trans-unit.source: It allows you to define a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls, where each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains child controls.
trans-unit.target: Permite-lhe definir um grupo de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlos, onde cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contém controlos subordinados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Your application can then render a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the client based on criteria such as user identity, user preferences, and information passed in a query-string parameter.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação, em seguida, é possível compor específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo para o cliente com base em critérios, tais como a identidade do utilizador, as preferências do utilizador e informações transmitido um parâmetro de cadeia de consulta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the MultiView control to create wizards.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar o controlo MultiView criar assistentes.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contained in a MultiView control represents a different step or page in the wizard.
trans-unit.target: Neste cenário, cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contido num controlo MultiView representa um passo diferente ou a página do assistente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: You should also use this control to develop multiple-screen applications for mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Também deve utilizar este controlo para desenvolver aplicações de várias ecrã para dispositivos móveis.

trans-unit.source: This control provides the same functionality as the ASP.NET mobile <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> control in .NET Framework version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Este controlo fornece a mesma funcionalidade que o ASP.NET mobile <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>controlo no .NET Framework versão 1.1.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control at a time can be defined as the active view within a MultiView control.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo numa altura pode ser definido como a vista de Active Directory dentro de um controlo MultiView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is defined as the active view, the child controls that it contains are rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo está definido como a vista ativa, os controlos subordinados nele contidos são apresentados para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: You can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method to define the active view.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método para definir a vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property is empty, the MultiView control does not render any content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade está vazia, o controlo MultiView não compor qualquer conteúdo para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the active view is set to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> that does not exist within the MultiView control, an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is raised at run time.
trans-unit.target: Se a vista ativa é definida como um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>que não existe no controlo MultiView, um <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>é gerado no tempo de execução.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: You can define the active view declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a vista ativa de forma declarativa ou através de programação.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property declaratively when you define the MultiView control causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the MultiView control is called.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>faz com que a propriedade de modo declarativo ao definir o controlo MultiView o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que está definido como denomina-se a vista ativa para compor a hora do cliente, o primeiro o controlo MultiView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: Exemplo de código seguinte demonstra como definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade forma declarativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:MultiView id="MultiView1" ActiveViewIndex=0 runat="Server"> ``` Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property programmatically, or calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method, allows the application to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or preferences.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:MultiView id="MultiView1" ActiveViewIndex=0 runat="Server"> ```Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade através de programação, ou chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método, permite que a aplicação determinar qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo ao compor para o cliente em tempo de execução com base em critérios como identidade de um utilizador ou preferências.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls within a MultiView control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir aos utilizadores navegar entre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlos num controlo MultiView, pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controlar a cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: To take advantage of the MultiView control's automatic updating of the currently active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, set the `CommandName` property on the button or link button to the value of one of the following command-name fields that corresponds to the desired navigation behavior: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.PreviousViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.NextViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIDCommandName>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName>.
trans-unit.target: Para tirar partido do controlo MultiView a atualização automática de atualmente ativos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, defina o `CommandName` propriedade no botão ou no botão de ligação para o valor de um dos campos de nome do comando seguintes, que corresponde ao comportamento pretendido navegação: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.PreviousViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.NextViewCommandName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIDCommandName>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SwitchViewByIDCommandName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.NextViewCommandName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.PreviousViewCommandName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                         ```
trans-unit.target: # # Sintaxe declarativa```                                                                                                                                                         ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o Active Directory <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo sobre um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlar as alterações entre pedidos POST para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveViewChanged event is raised when the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O evento de ActiveViewChanged é gerado quando o Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlar as alterações entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [como: consumir eventos numa aplicação Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do Active Directory <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the ActiveViewIndex property to set a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control as the active view.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade ActiveViewIndex para definir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo como a vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to return the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that is currently set as the active view.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar esta propriedade para devolver o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que está definido como a vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is determined by the order in which it is declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo é determinado pela ordem em que está declarado num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, the first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control has an index of 0.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o primeiro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo declarado dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo tem um índice 0.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control at a time can be defined as active within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo numa altura pode ser definido como Active Directory dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that is set to the ActiveViewIndex property will be rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que está definido para a propriedade ActiveViewIndex será composto para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the ActiveViewIndex property is set to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> that does not exist within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, a <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is raised at run time.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ActiveViewIndex está definida como um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>que não existe no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo, um <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>é gerado no tempo de execução.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control does not render any content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade está vazia, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo não compor qualquer conteúdo para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: You can set the ActiveViewIndex property either declaratively at development time or programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade ActiveViewIndex forma declarativa no momento de desenvolvimento ou programaticamente em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ActiveViewIndex property declaratively when you define the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is called.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade de ActiveViewIndex forma declarativa ao definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlar faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que está definido como a vista ativa para compor a hora do cliente, o primeiro o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo denomina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Setting the ActiveViewIndex property programmatically allows the application to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or their preferences.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade de ActiveViewIndex programaticamente permite que a aplicação determinar qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo ao compor para o cliente em tempo de execução com base em critérios como identidade de um utilizador ou das respetivas preferências.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A> methods to set or get the active view within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A>métodos para definir ou obter a vista de Active Directory dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do Active Directory <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, indicating that no view is set as active.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de -1, com a indicação de que nenhuma vista está definida como activa.

trans-unit.source: The specified index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado foi definido como inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control that an XML or HTML element was parsed, and adds the element to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo que um elemento XML ou HTML foi analisado e adiciona o elemento para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"> </xref> coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base class implementation to allow only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui a implementação de classe base para permitir que apenas os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlos para ser adicionado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o elemento analisado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Object> is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref:System.Object>não é um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> to hold the child controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> para conter o subordinado os controlos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base implementation to always return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui a implementação base para devolver sempre um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>para conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>os controlos de atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref> to contain the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> controls of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"> </xref> para conter o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> os controlos de atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se se aplicar temas para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableTheming indica se temas estão ativados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableTheming afetará também se temas estão ativados para os controlos contidos no seus <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade EnableTheming é `true`, o diretório da aplicação tema será pesquisado as skins de controlo aplicar.

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Se existir sem máscara para o controlo específico no diretório de tema, uma máscara não está aplicada.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade EnableTheming é `false`, o diretório de tema não é efetuado e o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>propriedade não são utilizados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control or the containing page.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo pode substituir o valor de EnableTheming definido pelo seu controlo principal ou página contentora.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control has EnableTheming set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo tem EnableTheming definido como `false`, pode aplicam seletivamente temas para individuais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlos contidos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>propriedade `true` nos controlos subordinados individuais.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if themes are to be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se temas estão a ser utilizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o Active Directory atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control that is currently set as the active view.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para devolver o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo que está definido como a vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and therefore can be used to access the properties of the active view.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar e, por conseguinte, podem ser utilizadas para aceder às propriedades da vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID` returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the current active view in MultiView1.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID` devolve o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade da vista atual Active Directory no MultiView1.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade obter ou definir o índice baseado em zero do Active Directory vista atual num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser acedida de forma declarativa ou através de programação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control that represents the active view within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo que representa a vista de Active Directory dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex*> property is not set to a valid <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex*>propriedade não está definida como um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar dentro de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Loads the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o estado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with the next <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome de comando associado com o seguinte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo a apresentar num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextViewCommandName field to represent the "NextView" command name.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de NextViewCommandName para representar o nome do comando "NextView".

trans-unit.source: You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control's automatic updating of the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor deste campo para tirar partido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>do controlo a atualização automática do Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that navigates to the previous <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to the value of the NextViewCommandName field, which is "NextView".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controlo navega para anterior <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>propriedade para o valor do campo NextViewCommandName, que é "NextView".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to automatically decrement the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo para diminuir automaticamente o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade quando o botão é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged> event is raised when the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control changes between posts to the server, and you can provide a custom handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>evento é desencadeado quando o Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo é alterado entre pedidos POST para o servidor e pode fornecer um processador personalizado para este evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: consumir eventos numa aplicação Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnActiveViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnActiveViewChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control is passed to the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o evento para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo é transmitido para a hierarquia de controlo da página IU servidores.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls that raise events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo contém <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controla que eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base implementation to handle navigation between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui a implementação base para processar navegação entre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi cancelado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The control cannot find the specified in the property of e.
trans-unit.target: O controlo não é possível localizar o especificado no propriedade e .

trans-unit.source: The property of e cannot be parsed as an integer.
trans-unit.target: O propriedade e não pode ser analisado como um número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando for notificado através deste método, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo tem de efetuar quaisquer passos de inicialização que são necessárias para criar e configurar uma instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: Nesta fase do ciclo de vida do controlo de servidor, o estado de visualização do controlo tem ainda de ser preenchido.

trans-unit.source: You cannot access another server control when this method is called, even if it is a child or parent of this control.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível aceder outro controlo de servidor quando este método é denominado, mesmo se for um elemento subordinado ou principal deste controlo.

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: Outros controlos de servidor não são determinados ser criado e estará pronto para o acesso.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with the previous <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome do comando associado anterior <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo a apresentar num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Use the PreviousViewCommandName field to represent the "PrevView" command name.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de PreviousViewCommandName para representar o nome do comando "PrevView".

trans-unit.source: You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control's automatic updating of the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor deste campo para tirar partido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>do controlo a atualização automática do Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that navigates to the next <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to the value of the PreviousViewCommandName field, which is "PrevView".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controlo navega para a próxima <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>, pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>propriedade para o valor do campo PreviousViewCommandName, que é "PrevView".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to automatically increment the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlar para incrementar automaticamente o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade quando o botão é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Called after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Chamar depois de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo é removido do <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A> method is called immediately after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>método é chamado imediatamente após um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo é removido do <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control that has been removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo que tenha sido removido.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlar conteúdo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto, para apresentação no cliente.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de composição é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo ao efectuar a derivação de uma classe personalizada a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The Render method writes the rendered content of the active view to the client using the supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: O método de composição escreve o conteúdo da vista ativa composto para o cliente utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> fornecido

trans-unit.source: You can set the active view in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a vista ativa num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlar utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>método ou a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: You can determine which one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection is the active view, if any, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode determinar que um do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controla no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>coleção é a vista do Active Directory, se existir, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A>método ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.GetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If an active view is set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is used to render content for that view and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Se uma vista de Active Directory está definida para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlar, o Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo é utilizado para compor o conteúdo para essa vista e respectivos controlos subordinados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: If an active view is not set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, no content is rendered to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Se uma vista de Active Directory não está definida para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo, não existe conteúdo é composto para <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que representa o fluxo de saída para compor HTML conteúdo no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado atual do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o estado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum Estado associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlar, este método devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to the active view within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo para a vista de Active Directory dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to set a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control as the active view.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para definir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlar dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo como a vista ativa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control at a time can be defined as active within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo numa altura pode ser definido como Active Directory dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that is set as the active view is rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que está definido como a vista ativa é composta para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that does not exist within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is set as active, an exception is raised at run time.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que não existe dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo estiver definido como ativo, é gerada uma exceção de em tempo de execução.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is set as the active view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control does not render any content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Se não <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo está definido como a vista do Active Directory, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo não compor qualquer conteúdo para o cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Using the SetActiveView method to programmatically set the active view allows the application to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity and preferences.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando o método de SetActiveView programaticamente definir a vista ativa permite que a aplicação determinar qual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo ao compor para o cliente em tempo de execução com base em critérios como identidade de um utilizador e preferências.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade obter ou definir o índice baseado em zero do Active Directory vista atual num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser acedida de forma declarativa ou através de programação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control to set as the active view within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlo para definir como a vista de Active Directory dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The specified view parameter value was not contained in the control.
trans-unit.target: Especificado view valor do parâmetro não estava incluído no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with changing the active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control, based on a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> id.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome de comando associado ao alterar o Active Directory <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo, com base numa determinada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> id.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Use the SwitchViewByIDCommandName field to represent the "SwitchViewByID" command name.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de SwitchViewByIDCommandName para representar o nome do comando "SwitchViewByID".

trans-unit.source: You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control's automatic updating of the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor deste campo para tirar partido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>do controlo a atualização automática do Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that navigates to the first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> when clicked, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to the value of the SwitchViewByIDCommandName field, which is "SwitchViewByID".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controlo navega para o primeiro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>Quando clica, pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>propriedade para o valor do campo SwitchViewByIDCommandName, que é "SwitchViewByID".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property to the ID of the first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, such as "Page1".
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>propriedade para o ID do primeiro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo, tais como "Page1".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to automatically set "Page1" as the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo para definir automaticamente "Page1" como o Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>quando o botão é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with changing the active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control based on a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> index.
trans-unit.target: Representa o nome de comando associado ao alterar o Active Directory <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controlar de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo baseia uma determinada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> índice.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Use the SwitchViewByIndexCommandName field to represent the "SwitchViewByIndex" command name.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de SwitchViewByIndexCommandName para representar o nome do comando "SwitchViewByIndex".

trans-unit.source: You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control's automatic updating of the active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor deste campo para tirar partido do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>do controlo a atualização automática do Active Directory <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that navigates to the first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> when clicked, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to the value of the SwitchViewByIndexCommandName field, which is "SwitchViewByIndex".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controlo navega para o primeiro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>Quando clica, pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>propriedade para o valor do campo SwitchViewByIndexCommandName, que é "SwitchViewByIndex".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property to the index of the first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, which is 0.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>propriedade para o índice do primeiro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo, o que é 0.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to automatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property to 0 when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo para definir automaticamente a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>propriedade como 0 quando o botão é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> controls in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controla no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically manage the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para gerir de forma programática a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controla num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"></xref> that represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> controls within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection"> </xref> que representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> controla dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
